titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disallow deductions for expenses for advertising tobacco products or alcoholic beverages on television or radio, in newspapers or magazines, or on billboards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow a deduction for expenses incurred in advertising tobacco products or alcoholic beverages on television or radio, in any periodical, or on any billboard.
